dt: {bc}a painful local purulent inflammation of the skin and deeper tissues with multiple openings for the discharge of pus and usually necrosis and sloughing of dead tissue

et: Middle English, from Anglo-French {it}charbucle, carbuncule{/it}, from Latin {it}carbunculus{/it} small coal, carbuncle, diminutive of {it}carbon-, carbo{/it} charcoal, ember
shortdef: any of several red precious stones
a painful local purulent inflammation of the skin and deeper tissues with multiple openings for the discharge of pus and usually necrosis and sloughing of dead tissue
